circumstances:
The crew was engaged in a mission to Stavanger-Sola Airport. While approaching the Norwegian coast, the bomber aircraft was shot down by the pilot of a German Messerschmitt Bf.109 and crashed into the sea off Stavanger. All seven crew members were killed. 
Crew (83rd Squadron):
S/L John Rawsthorn Rainford, pilot,
P/O Eric Alfred Warren, pilot,
P/O Trevor Hardy Smith, navigator,
F/Sgt John Charles Macgregor,
Sgt Thomas Rodie Riddell,
Sgt Robert Harold Taylor,
Sgt Peter James Jordan.
probable_cause: Shot down by a German fighter.
